transArray.content: The service of the hotel is very good. The main reason is that the location is so good. Living alone in the Qianmen Street Scenic Area, I feel afraid of being watched. I donâ€™t have to worry about being watched here. The handsome policeman has been patrolling all the time. Things are still patrolling, so it is safe to live here at the front door. It is recommended for girls who travel alone.
